metadata.title: CVE-2018-5650 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In Long Range Zip (aka lrzip) 0.631, there is an infinite loop andapplication hang in the unzip_match function in runzip.c. Remote attackerscould leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial of service via acrafted lrz file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5650` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lrzip - 0.631+git180517-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: lrzip package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.631+git180517-1').
